title: Installation with pip doesn't work
body:
First of all, thank you for the amazing work!
Still I faced some issues during installing.

When running `pip install -r requirements.txt` the process is stopped on `git+git://github.com/IlyaGusev/rouge.git@84f2530`

Obtained error on local machine is

```
Collecting git+git://github.com/IlyaGusev/rouge.git@84f2530 (from -r requirements.txt (line 5))
  Cloning git://github.com/IlyaGusev/rouge.git (to revision 84f2530) to c:\users\user\appdata\local\temp\pip-req-build-pwlhqtrm
  Running command git clone -q git://github.com/IlyaGusev/rouge.git 'C:\Users\User\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-req-build-pwlhqtrm'
  fatal: unable to connect to github.com:
  github.com[0: 140.82.121.4]: errno=Unknown error

ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 128: git clone -q git://github.com/IlyaGusev/rouge.git 'C:\Users\User\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-req-build-pwlhqtrm' Check the logs for full command output.
```

In Google colab same error:

```
fatal: unable to connect to github.com:
  github.com[0: 140.82.114.3]: errno=Connection timed out

WARNING: Discarding git+git://github.com/IlyaGusev/rouge.git@84f2530. Command errored out with exit status 128: git clone -q git://github.com/IlyaGusev/rouge.git /tmp/pip-req-build-64tsa2zu Check the logs for full command output.
ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 128: git clone -q git://github.com/IlyaGusev/rouge.git /tmp/pip-req-build-64tsa2zu Check the logs for full command output.
```

When this row is replaced with `git+https://github.com/IlyaGusev/rouge.git@84f2530` everything works
